title: Ghost.In.The.Shell.1995.ENGSUB.DVDRip.x264-HODAS [JAP Audio]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0113568/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0113568/</a>


This anime masterpiece by Mamoru Oshii deals with the line between man and machine, questioning our own human existence in the fast paced world of the information age.

The Puppetmaster is loose in society, destroying people's living essence and replacing their memories with implanted ones. It falls to a small governemnt group to stop it ... and a group of heavily augmented agents!


Ghost in the Shell is widely regarded as inspiration for "The Matrix".
